attributes.action: Ban the closure of the old bridge road from Godmanchester to Huntingdon
attributes.additional_details: Closing this bridge is another attack on the motorist. It will lead to more congestion, impact businesses and cost lives. This is an attack by the village busybodies and has no benefits for the local community. This must stop.
attributes.background: There is currently a preposterous proposition to close the Old Bridge from Godmanchester to Huntingdon. I would like Borris Johnson to ban this closure and make it a criminal offence for anyone to attempt such closures in the future.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
